department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 心理學是探討人類心智與行為的科學。以大腦、心智、與行為間的交互作用為主軸，以實驗取向探討人類行為及心智的表現與其內在機制。這門課程主要是以認知心理學的取向與研究內容為主要授 課材料。以大腦、心智、與行為間的交互作用為主軸，以實驗取向探討人類行為及心智的表現與其內在機制。課程將回顧、整理各種認知心理學的研究、並介紹根據研究結果所提出的認知心理學理 論。除了介紹基本的背景觀點與研究結果外，並以認知心理學各領域的主題為討論主軸，包括感覺與知覺，注意力，記憶，意識，語言和思考，認知發展，問題解決以及判斷與決策
goal.en: This course is based on the research and experiment paradigm in cognitive psychology as the main axis to explore the interaction between the brain, mind, and behavior. The course will introduce and explore the experimental orientation of human behavior and mental performance and its underlying cognitive mechanisms. The course will review and sort out various studies in cognitive psychological studies and introduce the psychological theory based on the findings. Main areas covered by the course includes sensation and perception, attention, memory, consciousness, language and thinking, cognitive development,decision making and problem solving.

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
